doc.title: Roulette
doc.plot: In a darkened room two men come together to play the ultimate game of chance, Carl has nothing to lose, his life already torn apart by addiction and homelessness, but still he clings to hope that things may turn around. The darkman, an enigmatic stranger who is willing to risk a fortune on the thrill of a life time, but is he all he appears to be? After witnessing the horrific death of another player, Carl must decide whether he has nothing to lose and everything to gain, but what is he really placing at stake? The stakes are high, and the risk is great, but when the bullet flies and the game is over one question remains. Who really won?
